snippet: Carmen Cardona, a disabled Navy veteran from Connecticut, is challenging the constitutionality of two federal laws that define marriage as being between opposite-sex partners.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: Carmen Cardona, a disabled Navy veteran from Connecticut, is challenging the constitutionality of two federal laws that define marriage as being between opposite-sex partners.

headline.main: Denied Veterans Benefits Over Same-Sex Marriage, Ex-Sailor Challenges Law
headline.print_headline: Denied Veterans Benefits Over Same-Sex Marriage, Ex-Sailor Challenges Law
headline.seo: Denied Veterans Benefits Over Same-Sex Marriage, Carmen Cardona Sues
